subsection.name: soapUI Feature Wish list
subsection.p: Obviously, there are a lot more features on the soapUI wish list for upcoming versions, add a feature request and it will be prioritized accordingly...(or even better, contribute these improvements yourself!)
Some of the features currently being considered (in no special order, let us know what you prefer!):

ul.li: Request generation/submittal support for WS-Security, WS-RM, etc..
WSDL authoring support (currently WSDLs/Schemas can not be modified)
